about_the_game:
You are a tentacle monster with a magic mechanical typewriter in the world's first 3d first-person Lovecraftian text editor RPG.

  • Explore and interact with your environment with creative writing and tentacles.
  • Learn different powers depending on what you write.
  • Defend yourself with ritual magic powered by writing whatever you want.
  • Export what you write as .txt files.
